name: Sleepless Knight
description:
Sleepless Knight  is a point-and-click adventure game where you play as a child afraid of the dark. Bereft of your gallant knight, you go out to search for them to fight a monster that is scratching at your window. You win the game when you are able to retrieve the knight. 

The Story:

Tommy and his family have just moved into a new home.  One night, Tommy forgets his teddy bear, Dame Galabear, downstairs and can’t sleep. He sees a 'monster' outside the window, and is afraid that the monster will get him. He doesn’t wanna tell his parents in case the monster gets them too, and Doggy the cat is nowhere to be found. So, Tommy decides to find Dame Galabear to protect them from the monster.
